text: Johannes Gerhardus Maria "John" Pierik (9 August 1950 - 14 January 2018) was a Dutch shooter.John Pierik . sports-reference.com He competed in the mixed skeet event at the 1980 and 1984 Olympics and finished in eleventh and fourth place, respectively. Pierik died on 14 January 2018 at the age of 68.Olympisch kleiduivenschutter John Pierik (68) overleden ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Olympians for the Netherlands Category:Sportspeople from Overijssel
title: John Pierik
